alert.note: Alert for Anchorage (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 21 at 12:05AM AKST until November 21 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Light freezing rain likely. Total ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Elevations lower than 1000 ft. * WHEN...Through 9 AM Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads, and bridges are likely. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures have dropped below freezing at lower elevations of the Anchorage bowl. This may allow the main roadways, particularly overpasses, to freeze. Additional freezing rain remains possible overnight Sunday night into early Monday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
